name: sticky
description: Sticky is a self-hosted digital sticky note board for quick thoughts and collaborative lists. It offers drag-and-drop notes in a simple, colorful layout.

features.title: Digital Sticky Notes
features.description: Creates virtual sticky notes on shared board

features.title: Drag
features.description: Moves notes around board with mouse or touch

features.title: Color Coding
features.description: Assigns different colors to notes for visual organization

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Sees changes from other users instantly

features.title: Text Formatting
features.description: Formats note text with basic styling options

features.title: Board Sharing
features.description: Shares boards with team members via links

features.title: Zoom And Pan
features.description: Navigates large boards with zoom controls
